long_description: The Rossignol BC 65 Positrack Backcountry Skis are lightweight, metal edge touring skis designed for off-trail exploring or on-trail use. Designed primarily for off-trail light backcountry use, but will track nicely on-trail as well (for those spending about 70% of their time off-trail and 30% on-trail). Wood with air channel core construction creates structural spines, adding torsional rigidity while reducing weight. Waxless Positrack bases provide maximum grip and a good compromise between kick and glide in all snow conditions. Rossignol BC 65 Positrack Backcountry Skis have full-length metal edges and a taller camber height than some backcountry skis for off- and on-trail versatility.
short_description: The Rossignol BC 65 Positrack Backcountry Skis are lightweight, metal edge touring skis designed for off-trail exploring or on-trail use.
